Name: VakariMod
Description:
Vakari is a mod created to track players and their actions while playing TUG. 
The goal is to classify players according to their behaviors in a way Nerd Kindgom can improve the gameplay experience based on how we like to play TUG.

Content.Value: We are distributing TUG keys for those willing to participate in this research. You can contact me at mspiezziraim@smu.edu to request a key. The key can redeemed on Steam by following these instructions.
You can download the mod here http://devotus.nerdkingdom.com/mods/TUG/VakariMod .
Before you launch TUG, it is important that you add the mod to your local folder and update the mods file. https://tugwiki.com/wiki/Modifications
